item.title: Blog
item.description:
My New Hugo Site https://jianjiandong.github.io/post/blog/ -

This is first Blog

how to build hugo blog

  1. hugo new site myblog // 创建本地文件
  2. git clone https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-agency-theme //下载主题
  3. hugo server -t hugo-agency-theme –buildDrafts //启动hugo
  4. hugo new post/blog.md //新建文章
  5. hugo –theme=hugo-agency-theme –baseUrl=“https://xxx.github.io/" –buildDrafts 将个人博客部署到github仓库
  6. 将生成的publi文件夹推到远程仓库
  7. 访问地址 https://jianjiandong.github.io/
- https://jianjiandong.github.io/post/blog/ -
